description: A React functional component for rendering a Reports page, providing buttons for downloading various reports in CSV, XLSX, and PDF formats. The component displays different report options along with descriptions and handles report download actions via an API call.

methods.name: Reports
methods.description: React functional component rendering report options and handling report download actions.

methods.name: onDownload
methods.description: Handles the download process by calling the downloadReport API with the specified report key, format, and filename.
